h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: This will be a tough fight to survive, and may take more than a few tries to understand how to survive his biggest attacks. At the very least, this phase only lasts for one half of his health bar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
This will be a tough fight to survive, and may take more than a few tries to understand how to survive his biggest attacks. At the very least, this phase only lasts for one half of his health bar.
